nodes.text: Respectable was an Imperial cruiser that was a part of the blockade of ThonBoka.

It functioned as a picket cruiser, challenging Lando Calrissian when he arrived at the blockade. Lando was brought aboard the vessel. He posed as a traveling salesman and gained the trust of a security chief onboard, who gave him contacts on other ships on the blockade he could sell his wares to.
The Respectable's over 200-meter hangar and closing hangar doors may imply that it was a Venator-class or some variant.
